query:
-- Create RusingAcademy header menu
INSERT INTO navigation_menus (name, location, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt) 
VALUES ('rusingacademy', 'header', 1, NOW(), NOW());
SET @ra_menu_id = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Create Lingueefy header menu
INSERT INTO navigation_menus (name, location, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt) 
VALUES ('lingueefy', 'header', 1, NOW(), NOW());
SET @lg_menu_id = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Create Barholex header menu
INSERT INTO navigation_menus (name, location, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt) 
VALUES ('barholex', 'header', 1, NOW(), NOW());
SET @bx_menu_id = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- RusingAcademy nav items
INSERT INTO navigation_menu_items (menuId, label, url, icon, sortOrder, isVisible, target, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
(@ra_menu_id, 'Courses | Formations', '/courses', 'BookOpen', 1, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@ra_menu_id, 'Our Curriculum | Notre programme', '/curriculum', 'GraduationCap', 2, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@ra_menu_id, 'For Business | Entreprises', '/rusingacademy/for-business', 'Building2', 3, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@ra_menu_id, 'For Government | Gouvernement', '/rusingacademy/for-government', 'Landmark', 4, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@ra_menu_id, 'Our Team | Notre équipe', '/coaches', 'Users', 5, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW());

-- Lingueefy nav items
INSERT INTO navigation_menu_items (menuId, label, url, icon, sortOrder, isVisible, target, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
(@lg_menu_id, 'Find a Coach | Trouver un coach', '/coaches', 'Search', 1, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@lg_menu_id, 'Discover Our Courses | Découvrez nos cours', '/curriculum', 'BookOpen', 2, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@lg_menu_id, 'For Departments | Pour les ministères', '/for-departments', 'Building2', 3, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@lg_menu_id, 'Become a Coach | Devenir coach', '/become-a-coach', 'UserPlus', 4, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@lg_menu_id, 'SLE AI Companion', '/prof-steven-ai', 'Bot', 5, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW());

-- Barholex nav items
INSERT INTO navigation_menu_items (menuId, label, url, icon, sortOrder, isVisible, target, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
(@bx_menu_id, 'Services', '/barholex/services', 'Briefcase', 1, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@bx_menu_id, 'Portfolio', '/barholex/portfolio', 'FolderOpen', 2, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@bx_menu_id, 'EdTech & AI | EdTech & IA', '/barholex-media#edtech', 'Cpu', 3, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@bx_menu_id, 'Podcast Studio | Studio Balado', '/barholex-media#podcast', 'Mic', 4, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
(@bx_menu_id, 'Contact', '/barholex/contact', 'Mail', 5, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW());
